versos: (beth) Psalm 119:9 - "How can a young man keep his way pure By guarding it according to your word.";;;

(coat) Genesis 37:3 - Now Israel loved Joseph more than any of his other sons, because he had been born to him in his old age; and he made an ornate robe for him.;;;
